title: Montessori Words & Phonics
description:
Based on the proven Montessori learning method, Montessori Words helps kids develop their reading, writing and spelling skills by building words from a set of 320 word-image-audio-phonics combinations using a phonics-enabled Movable Alphabet.

‚ûúTop 50 Android Apps For Kids 2013 - SmartAppsForAndroid.com
‚ûúThe iPad/iPhone version was mentioned in the New York Times, Wired's GeekDad, and was awarded "Editor's Choice Award for Excellence in Design" by Children Technology Review.
‚ûú Used in US schools

Common Core State Standard (CCSS):
CCSS.ELA-Literacy.RF.K.1b Recognize that spoken words are represented in written language by specific sequences of letters.
CCSS.ELA-Literacy.RF.K.2 & CCSS.ELA-Literacy.RF.1.2  Demonstrate understanding of spoken words, syllables, and sounds (phonemes).
CCSS.ELA-Literacy.RF.K.3 Know and apply grade-level phonics and word analysis skills in decoding words.

Montessori Words helps kids learn and understand two fundamental concepts: 
‚Ä¢ First, the app helps kids understand that words are made up of sounds/phonics (phonemic awareness). For each word, your kids can touch the empty rectangles where letters must be dragged to complete the word, and hear the sound the corresponding letter(s) produces. 
‚Ä¢ Secondly, the app helps kids memorize the phonics associated with letters by providing a phonics-enabled alphabet where kids can touch each letter and hear the associated phonic.

Montessori Words allows you to select words according to their difficulty or sound categories. 
‚Ä¢ Level 1 displays a three-letter word with no difficulty for beginning readers (CVC words).
‚Ä¢ Levels 2 and 3 offer more complex words that contains more complex phonics (as long vowels sounds or blends). ‚Ä¢ Alternately, your child can choose from 44 sound categories--choose words that contain a specific sound (for example, long a, ‚Äúk‚Äù sound, and so on).

To create an enjoyable experience, the app also includes sounds, animations, and interactive visual effects that are displayed after a word is completed.

Choose capital, lower-case, or cursive letter display for a greater challenge.

Montessori Words also features a movable alphabet that allows open-ended activities for young children learning their letters.


‚ûú Overview:

 ‚Ä¢ 320 word-image-audio-phonics combinations appropriate for ages 3/4 to 8 to help kids develop their reading, writing and spelling skills.
 ‚Ä¢ Uses the proven Montessori learning method (Phonemic Awareness and Phonics).
 ‚Ä¢ Phonics-enabled Movable Alphabet (touch a letter to hear its sound/phonic).
 ‚Ä¢ Touch letters of a displayed word to hear the phonics used in the word.
 ‚Ä¢ Select words according to difficulty (3 series - from CVC words to complex words) or sound (44 categories).
 ‚Ä¢ Includes 42 letter sounds/phonics.
 ‚Ä¢ Choose capital, lower-case or cursive letter display.
 ‚Ä¢ 21 fun and colorful interactive visual effects are displayed when a word is completed. Visual effects animate and change as they follow your child‚Äôs touch.
 ‚Ä¢ Packed with animations and sounds to create a fun and enjoyable experience!
 ‚Ä¢ Also included is a Movable Alphabet that allows open-ended activities for young children learning their letters. 
‚Ä¢  Children can play alone or with a parent. Includes instructions on how to use the game as an educational tool.

title: Toddler educational games: sorting & matching
description:
* Fun educational game for toddlers of age 2.5 and up 
* Build horizontal and vertical structures by size 
* Developed with certified child psychologists 
* 15 beautiful mini-game boards 
* Ascending difficulty level 

About the game: 
----------------- 
"TinyHands Towers 2" is an educational game for children of age 2.5 and up. The game consists of 15 beautiful boards designed to help toddlers acquire basic concepts such as: big VS. small, before VS. after, right VS. left, and bottom VS. top. 

The game is designed to enhance the following skills: 
- Hand-eye coordination 
- Concentration 
- Visual perception 

Game Boards: 
------------ 
The game consists of 15 boards with different difficulty levels as the number of puzzle pieces raises from 5 pieces up to 7 pieces. 


Game boards include horizontal and upside down towers constantly challenging the child to solve the puzzle. Optional "hint" mode can be used to control difficulty level

TinyHands Games:
 
TinyHands Sorting Series
A set of sorting games designed to help children acquire basic concepts such as shape, color, size seasons and animals. Game boards are organized in an ascending difficulty level starting from basic sorting followed by more complex context based sorting and classification environments.

TinyHands Towers Series
A set of stacking games. The game is designed to help children acquire basic concepts such as: big VS. small, before VS. after, and bottom VS. top. Game boards are organized in an ascending difficulty level.

TinyHands What's My Pair Series
A series of three pair matching games. The game challenges the child to match pairs, initially based on visual aspects alone and in more advanced screens based on logic and understanding of card content.

TinyHands First Words Series
A set of vocabulary games for children of age 1.5 and up.
The game consists of 10 boards, each focused on a different theme from the child's world such as shapes, colors, clothes, animals and vehicles.

TinyHands Raccoon TreeHouse
This game is intended for toddlers aged 3+. The game presents 12 boards each focused on developing a set of basic concepts such as size, colors, numbers and patterns using everyday objects from the child's world such as clothes, food and many more.

TinyHands Town Center
Educational game recommended for age 3+. This game includes 10 beautiful boards each focused on developing a set of basic concepts such as size, colors, numbers and patterns using everyday objects from the child's world such as clothes, food and many more.

TinyHands Connect The Dots
The game consists of 12 mini game boards each presents a beautiful and magical scene. Each board contains several parts. The parts can be completed by connecting the numbered dots in a specific order. Upon completion, each part is dragged to gradually build an object. When all parts are drawn the scene is magically created and revealed. Designed for children aged 3+.

Note for parents:
Like all our games, this game is designed to provide quality playtime for parents and children together. Playing along with your children is highly recommended and will surely make them benefit the most from this app and help them expand their vocabulary.

We are sure that your children will enjoy this exciting educational game that will encourage their thinking and contribute to the development of their basic skills.

About the Team: 
We believe that children learn best through playing. We teamed up with certified child psychologists and experienced educators out of desire to create fun games that will help our children acquire new concepts and improve their skills. In addition, we design our games to provide quality playtime for parents and children together.

description:

Expect weekly content updates during this period**

Features:

- Learn about psychopathology, psychiatric disorders psychotropics, psychotherapy and much other core knowledge in psychiatry.

-Useful tools for psychiatric clinical practice at your disposal.

- No more flipping and searching through books - our simple user interface makes finding information easy.

title: Kids Academy: Sorting Puzzles for Kids
description:
*** Fun EDUCATIONAL game for toddlers of AGE 2 and up
*** SORT AND CLASSIFY by shape, color, seasons, vehicles, and much more
*** Developed with certified child psychologists
*** 12 beautiful mini-game boards

About the game:
-----------------
This is the first and most simple game in the TinyHands Sorting series.
The game consists of 12 beautiful environments each focused on a set of basic concepts from the child's world such as shapes, colors, seasons, and animals.

The game is designed to enhance the following skills:
- Sorting and classifying
- Hand-eye coordination
- Concentration
- Visual perception
- Vocabulary

Game Boards:
The game consists of 12 boards ordered in an ascending level of difficulty.
The boards were carefully chosen in order to represent basic concepts from the child's world.

The field: Sort butterflies by COLOR.
Dogs screen: Classify dogs by SIZE.
Star, heart, and circle screen: Classify geometric SHAPES.
The laundry: Classify by COLOR.
Triangle, star, circle and square screen: Classify objects by their SHAPES.
Koalas: Sort clothes by their SIZE.
Circle, triangle, orange and green screen: Classify by SHAPES AND COLOR.
Squirrels screen: Classify squirrels by SIZE.
My food screen: Classify by ANIMALS TYPICAL FOOD
Day and night screen:  Contextually sort objects by TIME OF DAY 
My house screen: Classify animals by their HABITAT
Summer and winter screen: Contextually sort by SEASON 

TinyHands Games:
 
TinyHands Sorting Series
A set of sorting games designed to help children acquire basic concepts such as shape, color, size seasons and animals. Game boards are organized in an ascending difficulty level starting from basic sorting followed by more complex context based sorting and classification environments.

TinyHands Towers Series
A set of stacking games. The game is designed to help children acquire basic concepts such as: big VS. small, before VS. after, and bottom VS. top. Game boards are organized in an ascending difficulty level.

TinyHands What's My Pair Series
A series of three pair matching games. The game challenges the child to match pairs, initially based on visual aspects alone and in more advanced screens based on logic and understanding of card content.

TinyHands First Words Series
A set of vocabulary games for children of age 1.5 and up.
The game consists of 10 boards, each focused on a different theme from the child's world such as shapes, colors, clothes, animals and vehicles.

TinyHands Raccoon TreeHouse
This game is intended for toddlers aged 3+. The game presents 12 boards each focused on developing a set of basic concepts such as size, colors, numbers and patterns using everyday objects from the child's world such as clothes, food and many more.

TinyHands Town Center
Educational game recommended for age 3+. This game includes 10 beautiful boards each focused on developing a set of basic concepts such as size, colors, numbers and patterns using everyday objects from the child's world such as clothes, food and many more.

TinyHands Connect The Dots
The game consists of 12 mini game boards each presents a beautiful and magical scene. Each board contains several parts. The parts can be completed by connecting the numbered dots in a specific order. Upon completion, each part is dragged to gradually build an object. When all parts are drawn the scene is magically created and revealed. Designed for children aged 3+.

Note for parents:
Like all our games, this game is designed to provide quality playtime for parents and children together. Playing along with your children is highly recommended and will surely make them benefit the most from this app and help them expand their vocabulary.

We are sure that your children will enjoy this exciting educational game that will encourage their thinking and contribute to the development of their basic skills.

title: Conversation Therapy Lite
description:
Conversation Therapy gets people talking! Now you can try this professional speech therapy app to target higher-level expressive language, pragmatic, problem-solving & cognitive-communication goals for older children, teens and adults! 

This FREE trial gives you a small sample of what you can do with the FULL version of Conversation Therapy! Get full functionality with 1% of the total content in to see how it works.

With over 300 real photographs & 10 questions each, Conversation Therapy gives you 3000+ questions. Combine that with user profiles, group play, and customization, and you get an incredibly useful tool for therapy! There's also the option to get the questions in English, French, Spanish, German, Dutch, Portuguese, Italian, Finnish, Filipino or Zulu!

10 Question Prompts Include:
*Describe
*Define
*Remember
*Decide
*Feel
*Infer
*Predict
*Narrate (Story Starters)
*Evaluate
*Brainstorm

Perfect for Brain Injury, Stroke, early Alzheimer's Disease, Aphasia, Aspergers and other forms of Autism, AAC users, SLI, Life Skills for Special Needs, and Middle & High School language therapy and education. So many goals can be targeted: speech, language, and cognitive!

Set up user profiles with each user's goals for quick starts and score tracking. Use a guest profile to get going quickly. Email scores and professional reports. Play with up to 4 users in a group, scoring any user at any time.

Read each question aloud, or have clients practice reading, then discuss your answers. Scoring is available to track correct, incorrect, and cued/approximate responses. You can also customize each question, tailoring it for your clients or translating it into their language!

Even those with limited speech have opinions to share; use these opportunities to help find new ways of expressing complex thoughts ‚Äì the responses you get from this app are sure to surprise, impress, and illuminate strengths & weaknesses in your clients. These questions don't have "right" or "wrong" answers, but there are appropriate answers, well-formed responses, and clearly spoken replies that can be scored. 

Photo stimuli are sorted into 12 categories including:

title: Vachanamrut Learning App
description:
With the inspiration and guidance of Acharya Shree Koshalendraprasadji Maharaj and Bhuj Mahant Swami Shree Dharmanandan Dasji, the Vachanamrut is being made available in an ‚Äòapp‚Äô format to commemorate the bicentenary (200th anniversary) of the Vachanamrut.

Through various useful features such as short-and-simple definitions and easy-to-understand explanations, this app provides a study platform for spiritual seekers looking to better understand the subtleties of eternal knowledge and apply the teachings of Bhagwan Shree Swaminarayan to their lives. Utilising current technology, this app meets the needs of today‚Äôs spiritual generation by giving them access to ancient wisdom in a modern format ‚Äì making the study of the Vachanamrut a truly enjoyable experience.

The Vachanamrut Learning App contains easy-to-use features such as:

Personal Account
Register for an account using your email address or login using your existing Google or Facebook account for added functionality; notes, reading list, reading history and search history are automatically backed up.

Seamless Switching Between Devices
If you are logged into the app, your notes, reading list, reading history and search history all instantly synced to your other devices.

Auto Bookmark
Access the Vachanamrut that you last visited from the home screen.

Reading List
Add Vachanamruts to your reading list so that you never forget your "wish" list of ones to read as part of your study or research into a particular topic or concept.

4 Different "Languages"
Gujarati, Gujarati Transliterated (Lipi/Latin), Gujarati Phonetic and English.

Summary
Summary of each Vachanamrut to help you decide if the specific Vachanamrut is of interest to you. Also included are additional facts and images to assist with understanding the geography of where and how the Vachanamrut was delivered.

Dark or Light Mode
Read in the mode that best suits your eyes during the day or night.

Adjustable Font Size
Increase or decrease the font size to suit preference.

Line Spacing
Choose from 3 different line spacing options to suit your reading preference.

Read time indication
Have limited time? Pick a Vachanamrut that you will be able to complete by using our helpful read time indicators.

Audiobook
Listen to each Vachanamrut being read in Gujarati and follow along with the auto-scroll text. Great for those who are learning Gujarati or those who are having difficulty pronouncing difficult words. (Currently available in Gujarati, Gujarati Latin and Gujarati Phonetics mode).

Split Screen Mode
Read the same Vachanamrut in 2 different languages. Great for those who are learning Gujarati or those who are having difficulty pronouncing difficult words.

Sabha Pictorials
Artist depictions of each Vachanamrut to help you visualise the location of where it took place and what Maharaj was wearing.

Share
Share a link to the whole Vachanamrut or individual paragraphs with your friends.

Notes
Write personal notes about the whole Vachanamrut or individual paragraphs.

Copy
Copy paragraphs to easily paste text to apps that don't support sharing.

Biographies
Clickable names of notable persons; overlay window displays persons short biography.

Sanskrit Shlok Explanations
Clickable Sanskrit Shloks; overlay explains the meaning of each word. Clear and structured explanation of its meaning, with scriptural references.

Dictionary
Clickable difficult words; overlay window displays simple definitions of regional, scriptural and philosophical words.

Reading Plans
Let us guide you through the various spiritual concepts discussed in the revelations of Bhagwan Swaminarayan; reflect on what you have read and how you can apply it to your life.

Search
Search for any word in any language to get results of where this word appears, clicking on the desired result takes you to reading mode.

recentChanges:
- The Vachanamrut image pinned setting is now remembered when navigating around the app.

comments: Jay shree swaminarayan.....its the bestest app but when we are listening to the audio and once we finish listening to the particular vachnamrut it doest go on to the next by itself we will be blessed if you add the feature where it goes next by itself after we finish listening to one particular vachnamrut

The best app on vachnamrut so far. Most useful, creative and worth installing for everyone who is a spiritual seeker. The voluminous efforts put on by the creator and the team are much much appreciable.
Simply wonderful app...loved the touch meaning feature..and a drawing for each vachanamrut showing the actual place where Lord Swaminarayan said the divine words..

Very interactive and user friendly. Personally like the visual Sabha and what Maharaj is wearing on that particular day. Helps with the feeling of being part of the Sabha. I also like the notes section that allows me to write my thoughts as well as share with others. And also using the same application on other devices helps to carry on from where I left. Awesome work from all those involved. May Maharaj provide you with more strength and blessings to carry on such a wonderful seva.

Amazing app, with new features which are helpful to all people of all ages, however would it be possible if the biographies could be in English too? It's a truly amazing idea and concept, that has never been done before, just waiting for the English translation. Thank you.

title: Personality Disorders Guide
description:
"
   ‚òÖ‚òÖ‚òÖ Download It For Free ‚òÖ‚òÖ‚òÖ

Learn How to Help Someone with Mood & Personality Disorders!

Dealing with a personality disorder can be incredibly difficult, whether you‚Äôre the one suffering or you‚Äôre offering a friend or family member support with their condition. These problems normally require the help of a professional who is knowledgeable and has the resources available to truly offer relief.

Personality disorders are a group of mental illnesses. They involve long-term patterns of thoughts and behaviors that are unhealthy and inflexible. The behaviors cause serious problems with relationships and work. People with personality disorders have trouble dealing with everyday stresses and problems. They often have stormy relationships with other people.

Learn about mood, personality, anxiety, psychiatric, and psychotic disorders in this Application Videos.

Learning methods include slides, quizzes, matching, anagram and more. Medical App covers major topics like Anatomy, Physiology, Pathology and diagnostic testing and treatment. 

Do you find difficulty remembering medical questions & terms? Is it always a tedious chore for you to pour over medical knowledge in your brains? We can help you with that.

This play ready medical app can be thoroughly enjoyed whether you are on a plane, at your comfort zone, waiting for a friend, at the taxi, bus or train station, at the back seat of a car or even at work.

So, without further ado, let‚Äôs play this awesome fun-packed game. DOWNLOAD Medical Terminology Quiz Game now!

Happy Learning Peeps!

title: ThinkAsperger's
description:
Learn about Asperger's and complete a screening questionnaire. Asperger's disorder is now considered part of the Autism Spectrum Disorder.

In this app you will hear from professionals about diagnosis and treatment, a parent who has had first hand experience, and an individual with Asperger's. You can also complete a screening questionnaire to know whether further evaluation is needed. Provides resources for additional information and accessing diagnostic services. 

The ThinkAsperger's¬Æ app is designed for parents, educators, and medical professionals to aid in the identification of Autism Spectrum Disorder.

The Southwest Autism Research & Resource Center (SARRC) is a nonprofit, community-based organization dedicated to autism research, education and resources for children and young adults with autism and their families. SARRC undertakes self-directed and collaborative research projects, serves as a satellite site for national and international projects, and provides up-to-date information, training and assistance to families and professionals about autism and related disorders.

title: Personality disorder treatment
description:
Personality disorders (PD) are a class of mental disorders characterized by enduring maladaptive patterns of behavior, cognition, and inner experience,
What are Personality Disorders?

Personality is the way of thinking, feeling and behaving that makes a person different from other people. An individual‚Äôs personality is influenced by experiences, environment (surroundings, life situations) and inherited characteristics. A personality disorder is a way of thinking, feeling and behaving that deviates from the expectations of the culture, causes distress or problems functioning, and lasts over time.
For all information and advice, you will find carefully selected videos for you

comments: It's a shame that this game doesn't give you the coins you win. Played the daily challenge for 30 days and won the 200 coins, yet I didn't get them. Tried to contact them but the have no direct message. There is no use playing if you're going to cheat me out of the winnings. Also need to work on the words. There have been many words that you say no that are.....

Great game which is addictive, I play this all the time because it is simple yet fun. The only reason I have given it 4 stars is because there is one improvement which would be good to see in this game; and that would be an option to change colours of the block and background. Having played the game more 100s of times, seeing the same colours does make it dull. If this small update was implemented, it would make a huge difference.

I am giving this a low rating because of all the ads and the fact that you can get rid of them for 4 bucks but thats just for 30 days. Seriously???? Also the landscape never changes even though in the ad it showed green grass which looked cool. Shame on you devs. Where are the levels in the pictures and trailer? It's a great game but it's the same thing over amd over again.

Not what was advertised when It was an ad, I saw ad and was like woah that looks like a fun little game so I downloaded quickly without investigating, only to find this completely different game so for that I give a 1star. But it's a fun game so 5 star. DO NOT LIKE BEING TRICKED HOWEVER. Shame on you if you're in control of false advertising. But a fun game so I'm conflicted.

The music is peace allowing you to think ,no time presure,which allows you to relax,and the background pic is beautiful. No ads intrupt while your trying to think.So if you like block puzzles I highly recommed trying this one.

title: Cursive Writing Wizard - Handwriting
description:
** Editor's Choice Award (96/100) - Children's Technology Review **

Cursive Writing Wizard is the perfect app to help every child learn how to trace their ABC's, 123's and custom words (such as their names) through a fun system carefully designed to maintain motivation. 

Features:
‚Ä¢ Show and enforce how to trace letters and words correctly
‚Ä¢ 3 most popular US fonts (ZB, DN & HWT) + UK , French and Swiss fonts
‚Ä¢ Fun tracing using 26 animated stickers, sound effects and interactive games that animate letters at the end of tracing
‚Ä¢ Uppercase & lowercase letters, numbers and words
‚Ä¢ Ability to create your own word lists (and record audio for each word)
‚Ä¢ Fully customizable to suit every child‚Äôs needs (letter size, difficulty,...)
‚Ä¢ Check progress thanks to reports that display what the child has traced
‚Ä¢ Shapes tracing activity for toddlers
‚Ä¢ Create Worksheets and print them to help your child to write on paper

Suitable for kindergarten, toddlers, early learners, preschool and 1st grade kids, Writing Wizard  is an award-winning app used in schools. 

This free version of Cursive Writing Wizard contains all the features of the full version for a subset of letters, numbers and words, but you can't add your own words and you don't have access to the worksheets.
_______

PERFECT FOR KIDS

Kids want to have fun, and Writing Wizard offers a lot of fun to keep them motivated in learning writing! 

‚Ä¢ Kids learn trace letters, numbers and shapes using 50+ animated stickers and sound effects
‚Ä¢ Once tracing is complete, kids can interact with them on 6 games that animate letters
‚Ä¢ Children can trace any word and record their own voice for each word (write their name and hear it when tracing)
‚Ä¢ Preschool kids learn the whole alphabet with letter sound and letter name: they learn the appearance and pronunciation of each letter, they trace the letter and hear the sound at the same time
‚Ä¢ Kids can collect stars in 5-Stars play mode and have fun succeeding modes increasingly difficult
‚Ä¢ Early learners have five practice options: capital letters, lower-case letters, numbers, shapes or practicing full words
_______

PERFECT FOR PARENTS & TEACHERS

‚Ä¢ Ability to create your own word lists (and record audio for each word)
‚Ä¢ Detailed reports provide information on what kids have done, including the ability to replay and export the tracings to view kids' progress
‚Ä¢ Multiple parameters to customize the app according to child‚Äôs current education level (letter size, difficulty, show/hide model, allow to stop between key points, etc.)
‚Ä¢ Import & Export word lists 
‚Ä¢ Letter names and letter sounds (which can be customized)
‚Ä¢ A customizable 5-Stars play mode to maintain motivation and fun 
‚Ä¢ Create an unlimited number of users
‚Ä¢ 8 fonts

_______

KNOW WHAT'S INSIDE

As a Moms with Apps member, we follow the "Know what's inside" best practices for kids‚Äô apps.
L‚ÄôEscapadou takes children‚Äôs privacy seriously. We believe you should not have to worry about your kids being tracked by apps or websites.
This app:
‚Ä¢ Does not contains ads (except for our own apps which are listed in a child protected section)
‚Ä¢ Does not collect any user information
‚Ä¢ Protected External Links (a multiplication must be solved).

title: Visual Schedules and Social Stories
description:
Visual Schedules And Social Stories is a visual support app focusing on  using social stories and visual schedules to improve socially appropriate behaviors in children with autism. It's a virtual visual support app to assist children with autism and communication challenges at home, school and the community. The app replaces the traditional visual supports that can be cumbersome, time consuming, costly to create and limited in function.

Children with Autism Spectrum Disorder may have difficulty with expressive language or social skills. Social Stories are a tool that teachers and parents use to teach children with autism the appropriate way to act in a social situation. While Visual Schedules helps children with autism to have a daily routine and schedule for different tasks. They also like to know what to expect during the day. Visual schedules use pictures to show students which activities they will be doing that day.
They also help students stay on-task by showing them what work they need to do before they can participate in an activity they enjoy! 
Making Social Stories and Visual Schedules takes a lot of time and energy for teachers and parents who are already very busy. The time spent on laminating, gluing, and printing could be better used teaching children on how to use these great tools. And here is where Visual Schedules And Social Stories app comes in. Along with having multiple wonderful built-in Visual Schedules and Social Stories, the app also helps parents and teachers to create their own unlimited personal schedules and stories about new events or skills they are trying to teach. They can even upload images of the child to use in the story. If a child is learning to take turns. A parent can quickly make a visual schedule OR story using images, texts and can even add audios and videos, that shows the child taking turns appropriately. 

Visual Schedules And Social Stories is an amazing tool that can provide communication and directional assistance for those with autism and other communication challenges. 

We hope that Visual Schedules And Social Stories  will also help,  like the other many apps that we have developed to assist parents, caregivers, and other to care for, value and help kids with many various challenges thrive and develop.

Key Features:

‚Ä¢	Beautiful built-in library of Visual Schedules and Social Stories
‚Ä¢	Ability to Create your own Visual Schedules and Stories
‚Ä¢	Option to add Text, Image, Audio and Video to each step of a Schedule And also to each page of a Social Story.
‚Ä¢	Built-In Image Library 
‚Ä¢	Option to Share/ Email schedules and stories.
‚Ä¢	Option to Print Schedule and Stories as PDF.
‚Ä¢	No Internet required to Create OR Play any feature.
‚Ä¢	Easy to use, attractive interface.
‚Ä¢	No Ads

The app can be used by
- Teachers
- Parents
- Those with autism
- Visual aid for situational stress relief of those considered neuroatypical
- Special educators
- Those with communication challenges

Please share your suggestions & feedback on 

feedback@schedulenstories.com

Google+ : https://plus.google.com/u/0/107302410009075383713

Facebook:  https://www.facebook.com/articulationessentials

Twitter: https://twitter.com/articulationess

OR via Reviews Below

comments: Bought it and after 15mins with the full version deleted and refund requested. I attempted to make my own schedule using photos I took myself while adding steps. Most wouldn't save :( Next I tried to change an image using one of the stock images, saved. That one kept reverting also. Recorded audio, but where does that play? Lastly, I couldn't rearrange the order of the steps for a schedule. 15 mins of trying and failing I realized I can probably do the same thing with PowerPoint.

This app has potential. It is limited. Parents need access to pictures of a variety of individual task. You can upload your own picture which for some tasks like putting on shoes a child would recognize and maybe even relate better, howerever having the caricatures shoes would be more universally effective. If there were options and acess to unlimited art (different foods, clothes, places) for the variety of topics autism has. I would pay for it in a heartbeat. It has potential.

Great at making visual social stories, adding photos and voice cues. Downfall is that you cant login and share your stories on multiple devices. I have installed on my phone for on the go use, and on my sons tablet for home use, but have to create stories twice as they dont sync together.

Give 0 stars, limited to edit, useless for free version since not much you can do, good concept but since you very limited on fixing a schedule wouldn't even be worth a buy. Pretty much a waste of time and effort, practically useless, do yourself and download a diffrent app, can find better ones for free.
Not happy with this app at all very limited even on the full version would not recommend requested a refund to the app developer waiting for a response

title: 7 Little Words: A fun twist on crossword puzzles
description:
If you enjoy crossword puzzles, word finds, anagrams or trivia quizzes, you're going to love 7 Little Words!

Each bite-size puzzle consists of 7 clues, 7 mystery words, and 20 tiles with groups of letters. Solve the clues and unscramble the letter tiles to find the puzzle answers.

7 Little Words is FUN, CHALLENGING, and EASY TO LEARN. We guarantee you've never played anything like it before. Give 7 Little Words a try today!

From the creators of Monkey Wrench and Red Herring.

-----

7 Little Words contains 25 puzzles that you can play for free. Two new puzzles are available for free each day without any purchase.

PLAY 10,000+ PUZZLES

With more than 10,000 puzzles in this app, you will find:

‚Ä¢	5 difficulty levels, from very easy to impossible
‚Ä¢	theme puzzles that will have you searching for what the words have in common
‚Ä¢	collections of our famous Daily Puzzles
‚Ä¢	the option to play every puzzle in UK English
‚Ä¢	Spanish puzzles
‚Ä¢	puzzles written for an Australian audience
‚Ä¢	even fill-in-the-blank puzzles

It‚Äôs not quite a crossword, though it has words and clues. It‚Äôs not quite an anagram puzzle, though it has scrambled words. It‚Äôs definitely not a trivia quiz, though it has the occasional reference to geography, history, and science. 7 Little Words is a unique game you just have to try!

Whether you are a book worm (especially if you like reading the dictionary) or you just enjoy adding to your vocabulary, 7 Little Words will give you the daily mental workout your brain needs. You can play our unique little puzzles anywhere ‚Äì in the checkout line, in a waiting room, or even on a road trip. It‚Äôs not just a word game for adults ‚Äì many fans tell us they play 7 Little Words with the whole family!

You may subscribe to enjoy playing all of our puzzles. Yearly and subscription options are available. The subscription amount will be charged to your Google Play account as an in-app purchase. Your subscription will renew automatically unless you cancel it at least 24 hours before expiration. You can also turn off auto-renew at any time in your Google Play account settings.

You may also buy individual packs within the app without a subscription.

summary: Like Word Games? Solve Daily Puzzles and more with this fun brainteaser.
recentChanges: Bug fixes.
comments: Love the game! Endless content, easy to play for a few minutes. I wish it had modern, material design. Or at least a dark theme with grey accent colors instead of bright green.

The game itself is great. No timers, unlimited hints and relaxed gameplay. I wish there were more choices for hints than just three, the touch screen doesn't always respond and the descriptions can be a bit questionable at times.

Great trivia app to play with the family. Casting it to a Chromecast is great for this (i.e. cast whole phone screen). I strongly suggest adding a landscape orientation to the app for this purpose! (Otherwise it looks a bit poor in portrait on a Chromecast, try it.)
Broken again. App doesn't load or gets stuck loading levels and shows nothing but the thatch background. Has happened on and off for the past three updates.
This game really does help your mental function. It's better than the other word games I have played that claimed to help memory function. You can feel the change!

title: Deepstash - Self Improvement, Motivation & Care
description:
Think of Deepstash as your personal library of thoughts and knowledge. A daily source of inspiring & life changing stories and ideas. Read articles, learn skills, get productivity tips and discover life hacks. All curated by our team and presented to you in a simple, practical and easy to remember, short summarized format. Fuel your curiosity and get smarter daily.

It's like your social media feed, if your social media feed had things that mattered :-)

Content & articles that matter to you. Our team curates the best stories around the web (articles, videos, podcasts & more, from top publications and magazines like Medium, Inc, Lifehacker, Forbes, Mark Manson, FastCompany, BBC, Tony Robbins & more) and provides actionable and inspiring short form key insights to improve yourself personally and professionally. A wealth of self help knowledge in your pocket.

Have questions? You‚Äôll surely get answers by reading, learning and exploring a world of hard and soft skills as well as interests like time management, self improvement, leadership, self-confidence, motivation or psychology, that will make you a great fit anywhere in life you put your mind to.

Summarized ideas. You need just 5 minutes per day. Our team works for you. We provide a summary of the main insights of articles and other web content in a short and crisp 100 words or less format we call ‚Äúideas‚Äù.

Escape the negativity and time wasting pull of social media platforms. Our app‚Äôs goal is to help you towards self improvement and self care and to get you motivated, inspired, wiser and productive.

Personalized content & feed. Choose a few topics of interest (like self improvement, time management, problem solving, love & relationships & more) and then just use the app at your leisure. As you save ideas and use our app, we learn what you like and find the best stories and articles to show you every day, so you‚Äôre motivated and inspired. You don‚Äôt even have to work for it.

The more you save ideas the better we learn what articles and topics you love. We refresh your recommendations multiple times a day so you never run out of fresh stories and ideas.

Build and organize your knowledge. You can save ideas in your own personal profile and build your own hub of facts, skills, quotes, information and ideas that matter to you.

Search and filter your ideas and articles by recent, oldest or most popular and organise your knowledge into personalised stashes, which are basically collections of insights stocked up and ready to go for when you need them: a Powerpoint presentation, a new job interview, a date, a project at work, or negotiating your rent with the landlord.

Share your knowledge. We make it super easy for you to share the best articles, quotes, stories and ideas on any channel you want. Send it to a friend on Whatsapp or share it with your followers on Instagram.

Share a link to ideas or just an image. We built special image formats for each social network (Instagram, Facebook, Twitter and others) so your ideas look best.

No ads. No distractions. 100% Free. The Deepstash app is free and open to everyone. Get a clean reading experience and focus on the content instead of being distracted with annoying ads or dozens of notifications about ‚Äúpremium‚Äù subscriptions. descriptionHTML:
Think of Deepstash as your personal library of thoughts and knowledge. A daily source of inspiring & life changing stories and ideas. Read articles, learn skills, get productivity tips and discover life hacks. All curated by our team and presented to you in a simple, practical and easy to remember, short summarized format. Fuel your curiosity and get smarter daily.

It's like your social media feed, if your social media feed had things that mattered :-)

Content & articles that matter to you. Our team curates the best stories around the web (articles, videos, podcasts & more, from top publications and magazines like Medium, Inc, Lifehacker, Forbes, Mark Manson, FastCompany, BBC, Tony Robbins & more) and provides actionable and inspiring short form key insights to improve yourself personally and professionally. A wealth of self help knowledge in your pocket.

Have questions? You‚Äôll surely get answers by reading, learning and exploring a world of hard and soft skills as well as interests like time management, self improvement, leadership, self-confidence, motivation or psychology, that will make you a great fit anywhere in life you put your mind to.

Summarized ideas. You need just 5 minutes per day. Our team works for you. We provide a summary of the main insights of articles and other web content in a short and crisp 100 words or less format we call ‚Äúideas‚Äù.

Escape the negativity and time wasting pull of social media platforms. Our app‚Äôs goal is to help you towards self improvement and self care and to get you motivated, inspired, wiser and productive.

Personalized content & feed. Choose a few topics of interest (like self improvement, time management, problem solving, love & relationships & more) and then just use the app at your leisure. As you save ideas and use our app, we learn what you like and find the best stories and articles to show you every day, so you‚Äôre motivated and inspired. You don‚Äôt even have to work for it.

The more you save ideas the better we learn what articles and topics you love. We refresh your recommendations multiple times a day so you never run out of fresh stories and ideas.

Build and organize your knowledge. You can save ideas in your own personal profile and build your own hub of facts, skills, quotes, information and ideas that matter to you.

Search and filter your ideas and articles by recent, oldest or most popular and organise your knowledge into personalised stashes, which are basically collections of insights stocked up and ready to go for when you need them: a Powerpoint presentation, a new job interview, a date, a project at work, or negotiating your rent with the landlord.

Share your knowledge. We make it super easy for you to share the best articles, quotes, stories and ideas on any channel you want. Send it to a friend on Whatsapp or share it with your followers on Instagram.

Share a link to ideas or just an image. We built special image formats for each social network (Instagram, Facebook, Twitter and others) so your ideas look best.

No ads. No distractions. 100% Free. The Deepstash app is free and open to everyone. Get a clean reading experience and focus on the content instead of being distracted with annoying ads or dozens of notifications about ‚Äúpremium‚Äù subscriptions. comments: Loved the app. I can see the articles in this app slowly impacting my daily routine. It's keeping me motivated. It's helping me learn things. I feel like reading a good book after just a small article. Thing to improve: it suggests me a good article in the notification and when I click it nothing happens. The notification just disappears.

This is an amazing app!!!!I am writing my review after one month of using it and the app gives me some inspirational ideas and strategies to make my lifestyle better in a progressive manner.However, I am giving 4 stars because of the bugs.When I open the app,it freezes for a few minutes and works.I hope it can be rectified on upcoming updates. EDIT : Thanks for the response from the team! It just works fine now . Reinstall fixed the bugs. I already had the latest 4.3.0 and it had bugs somehow..

Instead of swiping to read the next article, may I suggest putting an icon that we can tap on to go to the next article instead of swiping? when scrolling on the current article that I'm reading, I accidentally scroll too far to the left/right and it goes to the next article and when I go back, it didn't even refresh to where I left off! I love this app, I prefer it more than social media, but it's so annoying when I accidentally swipe on the next article and have to go back & scroll down again!

In a world that seems to be a raging dumpster fire, and everything in social media and news pointing to how bad things are getting... This app is a breath of fresh air. It offers simple, memorable morsels of wisdom. Easily consumable. It is so important to focus on what we can control---ourselves. Working on bettering ourselves, our mindsets, and expanding our horizons is the way we change the world. I am adding this app to my home screen and making a commitment to read articles daily. Great app

This is just so worth it. If I were to recommend something that is worth accessing, well this is pretty much on my top list of reads. I'm loving this, the settings, the articles in it and the concepts of developing such an app was so just so impressive. Hats off to the developers and creators.

title: ADHD Health Storylines
description:
Developed in partnership with the Attention Deficit Disorder Association (ADDA), this app makes it easy to record your symptoms, routines, moods, medication, and more for adult attention deficit hyperactivity disorder (ADHD). Choose what you want to track to build your own health story. This helps you learn more about your health, and share more with your care team, so you both see the full story.


More than just a ‚Äúproductivity app‚Äù, ADHD Health Storylines provides tools for managing your life with ADHD in the following ways:

BUILD SELF-AWARENESS
Track your symptoms, moods and thoughts using built-in tools to quickly and conveniently capture events and their effects as they happen. You can also import data from other health and fitness apps that you use.

SET REMINDERS
Plan and create a routine and medication schedule, all with auditory and visual alerts. Never miss a dose again. Disclaimer: App only contains medication database for US and Canada at this time. Other countries medication databases coming soon.

CELEBRATE ACCOMPLISHMENTS
Record completing everyday chores, share insights and capture achievements in the success journal.

CREATE GOOD HABITS
Build personalized routines and track your weekly progress towards creating successful habits.

SHARE THE JOURNEY
Every captured event is summarized in a simple view called ‚ÄúMy Storylines.‚Äù Choose what you want to track, and choose what you want to share with your care team or your loved ones.

By using ADHD Health Storylines, you have the opportunity to anonymously contribute learning from your story to a vital data resource that the healthcare industry can use to improve care in the future, for people like you.

ADHD Health Storylines is developed in partnership with the Attention Deficit Disorder Association (ADDA) for adults with ADHD, and is powered by the Health Storylines‚Ñ¢ platform from Self Care Catalysts Inc.

recentChanges: Performance Enhancements
comments: You have to choose your "conditions" and medications from a database and this app didn't have any of my meds in their database. My mental health conditions were in the database but none of my medications were. And you can't manually input your own meds. I deleted it before I even finished setting it up. Needs a lot of improvement.

App is dead. There is no option to manually enter health issues or medications... they appear to have deleted their medication database as the are no medications that come up no matter what you put in so the only choice is to skip it which makes half the app inoperable... oh well.

Setting up medications is REALLY confusing. There are dozens of formulations that are in the list, but their missing Amphetamine salts, which, in my experience, is a common label for generics. That pretty much stopped me there. A quick look at the other 'tools' and, well, not very descriptive. Overall, this app strikes me as an 'everything for everyone'. I don't know where they got their knowledge base data, but they need to do more research. Some treatment providers claim to treat adult ADHD, but will only use dosages appropriate for children and adolescents and stop there, in spite of guidelines for adults being available. More often than not, adults are undertreated. This app would just muddy up treatment.
Super sad because I really wanted to use this :/ it wouldn't show me ANY medication to put as mine including 3 major ADHD meds. So sad I have to delete ):
Really good as it's specialised, but sadly seems to no longer be supported - not updated for 2 years :(

title: Memory games: Memory Match - Picture Match.
description:
Memory games classics that never get old. Memory Match is one classic memory game based on the traditional board game where you have to pair matching cards that are upside down. This picture matching game will challenge your memory, concentration, attention and test your brain skills. Memory Match is a great way to exercise your memory and test your brain. Find the matching tiles!

Picture Match is a great matching games for adults but also an amazing and challenging matching games for all ages. It is a memory game for everyone were you have to distinguish between beautiful images, full of colors, and find the pairs. Exercise your brain with brain games every day. Take this memory challenge and you will see the difference!. 

Why accept this memory challenge? well, this game will not only improve your memory, it also increase your accuracy, train your reflexes, increase your speed and can help you with short term memory problems or lack of attention like ADHD.

You can play a story mode to challenge your skills every day or if you are in a hurry you can play a quick mode game. Memorize the beautiful images (logos, cartoons, etc) of the cards and find theirs pairs, boost your brain. 

Different levels of difficulty and lots of decks to choose from
‚Ä¢	Logos
‚Ä¢	Animals
‚Ä¢	Cartoons
‚Ä¢	Vehicles
‚Ä¢	Mobile games
‚Ä¢	And more..

Memory match is an intellectual game and logic game for all ages.

We hope you enjoy our find the pair game, Memory Match. Improve your visual memory, sharpen your mind and train your memory every day.

Please rate the app and leave us feedback to improve it. 


Website: www.brandedbrothers.com
Facebook: www.facebook.com/BrandedBrothers.Gaming

comments: Memory Match game has been very entertaining and I rate it 5 stars. It supports my memory in keeping it sharp.

It is a really good game for people like me who have memory problems due to an illness or injury. But all the pop ups are distracting and they make it a little difficult to stay on a regular schedule cause it gets frustrating when you get interrupted by pop up . But again it's a great game. Thank you.

It's fine, nothing special and at the end quite boring. I'm not going to uninstall for now as maybe tomorrow I would like to play, but after 10 level, it's enough for today... the music could be better, I found it's distracting, better off.
I really like this game. It helps me relax and focus. ‚ò∫Ô∏è It's just simple flipping cards matching pictures very easy very simple.
Fun but gets pretty complicated at higher levels where the cards start moving around quickly. A nice way to challenge your brain though.

title: SAT Flashcards: Prep & Vocabulary
description:
Master important SAT concepts with Magoosh's SAT flashcards for your android! It's easy to use and will help you memorize key concepts quickly!

‚òû English and Math SAT concepts 
‚òû 350 vocab words picked by an expert SAT tutor
‚òû Definitions and example sentences for every concept and word
‚òû Decks for every difficulty level
‚òû Track your progress as you study
‚òû Smart algorithm focuses your practice for efficient learning

This app gives you access to all of Magoosh‚Äôs SAT flashcards. Sign in with a Magoosh account (or create a new one) to save your progress to the web.

Written by SAT experts
The entire SAT wordlist is selected and defined with usage examples by Magoosh‚Äôs expert SAT tutors, led by Chris Lele. He has been teaching the SAT for more than 10 years, runs a popular vocabulary series on YouTube and he‚Äôs also written an eBook on vocabulary. He is unbeatable in Scrabble, or any other word game for that matter.

Review that really sticks
Academic research has found that memories are formed by repeated exposure to new information, so Magoosh‚Äôs flashcard app uses a spaced repetition system. Words you are learning will reappear frequently (occurring less frequently the better you know them) and words you already know won‚Äôt be repeated. Our SAT word list is also kept to only 350 words so that you don't waste time learning unimportant words.

About Magoosh
We're an online test prep company with a focus on teaching the SAT through videos and personalized customer support.

More SAT study tools
Search the app store for ‚Äúmagoosh sat‚Äù to continue your prep for the College Board‚Äôs SAT with Magoosh‚Äôs video lessons app.

When you‚Äôre ready to practice for the full SAT exam, Magoosh‚Äôs website has more than 700 excellent SAT Math, SAT Reading and SAT Writing practice questions, each with its own detailed video explanation. After each quiz, you can review your answers to see your strengths and weaknesses.

Have any questions? Please ask!
Customer satisfaction is incredibly important to us. If you have any questions or comments, please send us an email at help@magoosh.com.

Don‚Äôt wait until the last minute to start studying, start using Magoosh‚Äôs SAT Flashcards app today!

title: Mnemonic Dictionary - Fastest Vocabulary Builder
description:
Do you struggle remembering vocabularies? Do you feel for a booster to help you remember difficult vocabulary for long time? If so, mnemonic dictionary will be your best companion ever. Using this vocabulary builder app, you will learn thousands vocabulary faster than ever. 

Simple Way to Learn Vocabulary for GRE
Mnemonic dictionary includes all available gre word list to ease your preparation. You can select any favorite vocabulary list for GRE. Then you can study these words progressively using mnemonics, quiz and many more.  Some important vocabulary list included here

* Magoosh 1000 words with mnemonic
* Barrons 333 & Barrons 800 with mnemonic
* Word Smart 1,2
* Manhattan GRE word list

Smart Vocabulary Builder App 
Mnemonic Dictionary incorporates thousands of mnemonic to help you learn vocabulary effectively and efficiently. Considering difficulties of learning and remembering new vocabulary for competitive exams like GRE, GMAT, SAT, BANK, BCS, IELTS and TOEFL, Mnemonic Dictionary aims to provide best technique/mnemonic/memory key for English Vocabulary.

In this vocabulary builder app user can add their own mnemonic and they are doing it continuously so you will get memory key for vocabulary from multiple sources. This process is really a fun when learning high frequency English vocabulary.

We would like to accept your query, suggestions or new mnemonic, please contact us at sharifur101@gmail.com

comments: It's a good vocab app. I especially like it since it brings together high-frequency words of different words. However, I couldn't find the quiz questions impressive. They needs to customise the quiz answer options with more variety and words with nearby but confusing meanings.

1. Lists of words are good. 2. People suggest quite good mnemonics to remember words. 3. Recommendation to developers: Add category of words whether it is noun, adjective, verb or adverb (it will help readers using word in a sentence)
It's a good app. Everything is perfect. But only a thing is missing. There should be parts of speech beside every word. It'd be more helpful if we are able to know the parts of speech of the word.

Wonderful app. However, if I search a word, I don't understand under which button the word belongs to. For an example, I searched for ' surreptitiously ' and I found it but I don't where it belongs. Whether, magoosh 1000 or Barron's 333. I can swipe right and left and there are so many words. But the minute I exit, I can't find them. It is not possible to find the word before going through all the available options. Which is quite demanding... Nevertheless, it is an absolute gem of an app.
A very good and interesting app for GRE. However I don't understand what you mean by 'high frequency' word 'medium frequency' or 'low frequency '. Are you saying how they appear often on GRE?

 ŸÉÿ¨ÿ±ÿßÿ≠Ÿá ÿßŸÑŸÖÿÆ ŸàÿßŸÑÿßÿπÿµÿßÿ® ŸÑŸÑÿßÿ∑ŸÅÿßŸÑ - ÿßŸÖÿ±ÿßÿ∂ ÿßŸÑŸÜŸÅÿ≥Ÿäÿ© ŸàÿßŸÑÿπÿµÿ®Ÿäÿ© ŸÑŸÑÿßÿ∑ŸÅÿßŸÑ - ÿ¨ÿ±ÿßÿ≠Ÿá ÿßŸÑÿπÿ∏ÿßŸÖ ŸÑŸÑÿßÿ∑ŸÅÿßŸÑ - ÿßŸÖÿ±ÿßÿ∂ ÿßŸÑÿπÿ∏ÿßŸÖ ŸÑŸÑÿßÿ∑ŸÅÿßŸÑ - ÿßŸÑÿπŸÑÿßÿ¨ ÿßŸÑÿ∑ÿ®ŸäÿπŸä ŸÑŸÑÿ£ÿ∑ŸÅÿßŸÑ - ÿßŸÑÿ™ÿ∫ÿ∞Ÿäÿ© ÿßŸÑÿπŸÑÿßÿ¨ŸäŸá ŸÑŸÑÿßÿ∑ŸÅÿßŸÑ - ÿßŸÖÿ±ÿßÿ∂ ŸàŸÖÿ¥ÿßŸÉŸÑ ÿßŸÑÿßÿ≥ŸÜÿßŸÜ ŸÑŸÑÿßÿ∑ŸÅÿßŸÑ Ÿàÿ∫Ÿäÿ±Ÿáÿß ŸÖŸÜ ÿßŸÑÿ™ÿÆÿµÿµÿßÿ™ ÿßŸÑŸÖÿÆÿ™ŸÑŸÅŸá ÿßŸÑŸÖŸÜŸàÿ∑ ÿ®Ÿáÿß ŸÖŸÜÿßÿ∏ÿ±Ÿá ÿ≠ÿßŸÑÿßÿ™ ÿßŸÖÿ±ÿßÿ∂ ÿßŸÑÿßÿ∑ŸÅÿßŸÑ ŸàÿßŸÑÿ¥ŸÑŸÑ ÿßŸÑÿØŸÖÿßÿ∫Ÿä ŸàÿßŸÑÿ™Ÿàÿ≠ÿØ

- ÿ≠ÿßŸÑÿßÿ™ ŸÖŸÑÿÆ ÿßŸÑŸàŸÑÿßÿØÿ©
- ÿ™ÿ£ŸáŸäŸÑ ŸÖÿß ÿ®ÿπÿØ ÿßŸÑŸÉÿ≥Ÿàÿ± Ÿàÿ™ÿßŸáŸäŸÑ ŸÖÿß ÿ®ÿπÿØ ÿßŸÑÿπŸÖŸÑŸäÿßÿ™ ÿßŸÑÿ¨ÿ±ÿßÿ≠ŸäŸá

ŸçSTRIDE app is the only comprehensive guide for parents of children with special needs, parents of children with cerebral palsy and the comprehensive guide to physical therapy for children

The application gives you all the information you need to deal with your child with special needs, children with cerebral palsy, autism and physical therapy for children

Services and information provided by the application:

* Physical therapy for children

* The application allows free communication service with doctors with high efficiency in the treatment of motor and mental problems of children with special needs and children of cerebral palsy and autism and pediatric physiotherapists

* Intensive physical therapy for children: The application contains all the intensive physical therapy , rehabilitation  , hydrotherapy and  home exercises for children and treatment programs in an easy and simple way to facilitate the homes of children with special needs and children of cerebral palsy and autism

* Mental rehabilitation and early intervention for children: The application contains all the mental and cognitive rehabilitation of children from the development of child skills - Speech and speech problems - Learning difficulties - Behavior modification - Occupational therapy - Hyperactivity - Dispersion of attention - Lack of focus and attention and awareness of programs and exercises and home games Simple

* Other medical interventions: The application contains all information from different medical specialties for children with special needs, children of cerebral palsy and children of autism

* orthoses  , supports and artificial limbs for children



- Cerebral palsy
- birth defects and bone malformations
- Problems walking and walking on the fingers
- syndromes
-  Spinabifida
- Motor delays
-  muscle atrophy
- Autism
- Muscle weakness
- Immunodeficiency Diseases
- Rehabilitation of post-injection of Botox
-  erb's palsy
- Post-fracture rehabilitation and postoperative rehabilitation

The application gives you all the information you need to deal with your child with special needs, children with cerebral palsy, autism and physical therapy for children

Services and information provided by the application:

title: Colors and Shapes game for Kids and Toddlers Free
description:
Our coloring game helps the kids to learn the colors and also to differentiate the various colors based the given objects. 

This app induces the curiosity of the children to learn and also to find out the given colored objects and shapes. The app shows few colored objects or different shapes at the bottom of mobile screen and the kids have to match the objects with relevant colors or shapes. 

Kids learning and coloring game comprises of two major parts. One part helps the kids to be familiar with a range of colors as well as colored objects.  

 The coloring section has divided into three sections such as LEARN, PRACTISE and TEST.  This section facilitates the kids to recognize the color of the given object & drag it to appropriate place and also provides paint through section.

Another part comprises of different shapes. Varieties of shapes are there and so it‚Äôs too tough to identify the exact name of a shape. To eliminate these difficulties, this learning shapes app offers Audio assistant for the kids. 

Features:

1. Guessing Colors based on the given objects
2. Attractive colors
3. Numerous shapes
4. Exciting colored objects 
5. Audio Assistance 
6. Easy User interface (Touch and Drag)  
7. Completely free app

title: Learn Music Notes [Free]
description:
Jungle Music is an educational game that lets you easily learn to read music notes in all clefs through an innovating, progressive, playful and instructive method, specially designed for beginner musicians.

Achieve your quest through the jungle of a desert island and feed your chameleon with flies-notes.
The more you progress, the more he grows ... until he becomes the King of Music!

+ Simple and efficient gameplay to recognize and memorize notes while having fun at the same time!
+ Custom level : Design your training!
+ Visual and auditory learning to become a real musician!


With Jungle Music, learning music notes becomes child's play!

*****************************
Features :

Each clef is divided into 20 levels of difficulty, allowing you to learn music notes at your own pace. 
Earn stars by recognizing as many notes as possible.
Obtaining each level 3rd star is timed and unlocks the next level.

For each clef, completing the 2nd level unlocks the custom level where you can choose the music notes to work.
Select at least 3 notes among those already learned. The more you progress on the island, the more notes you get.
You can also choose a random game.
Perfect for daily training!

Jungle Music will improve your skills in :
+ Score sight reading
+ Ear training through listening to the sound of the note (piano sounds)  
If a mistake is made, the correction is provided. 

An invaluable tool for learning music theory and solfege: 
+ Learn music notes in :
  + G-Clef : Treble 
  + F-Clefs : Bass, Baritone 
  + C-Clefs : Soprano, Mezzo-Soprano, Alto, Tenor	
+ Reading on the staff, as well as reading under and above the staff
+ Choose the writing of music notes among (Do Re Mi Fa Sol La Si) / (C D E F G A B) / (C D E F G A H)

This is the free version of Jungle Music.
Check the full version:
+ unlimited use
+ extra-time on timed parts
+ various landscapes to customize your game
+ display piano keyboard 
+ up to 4 players for having fun with family or friends
+ choose among piano, guitar or violin/cello sounds

recentChanges: new runtime engine for a better user experience
comments: This app is could be a great learning tool for kids, but unfortunately it punishes them for getting 5 notes wrong, and makes them wait 8 hours to have another try (or pay money). I wanted to have them try and see if they stuck with it enough for it to be worth paying for the better version of the app, but my kids got too frustrated with the "come back in 8 hours" message after 5 mistakes and they don't want to play it anymore. It's disappointing, because I have learned pretty quickly from it.

I'm a teacher looking for a app for students. I'm also a programmer, but was hoping not to have to program a basic music learning tool. This game has kid friendly graphics, but it's absurd to make a kid do each level 3 times, which is stressful, but it's also not how that gameplay function is used. If the game were balanced for learning, it would be great, but it's garbage otherwise. 1 star bc kids will hate it.
This has been a wonderful help in my relearning the scales and notes!! I would recommend this to everyone.

The app concept is sound, but the selection of note interface needs more room or some visual improvement. Additionally, from what I can tell initially, the stems on the staff are always up, which makes this game not only more difficult than it should be, but fails to incorporate a very significant aspect of learning to associate (or reproduce) notation correctly.

This is a very nice way for the kids to practice their notes. I do wish i could choose which notes they start with and practice. They start at the bottom of base cleft when all beginner piano books teach them from middle c... It was definitely worth the two dollars to buy the whole game so they can practice all the notes.

title: Learn Kannada in 10 Days - Smartapp
description:
Learn Kannada (Kannada kali) is an android app developed exclusively for those who want to learn spoken Kannada on the go. Along with Day Course, it also provides "Flexi Course" which helps people learn Kannada at their own schedule. App also provides the smart feature of "IWT (Instant Word Translation)" which helps users find instant word translations from English to Kannada. The app is smart enough to verify your pronunciation and provide valid feedback. Once you are confident enough, you can take specially designed 30 sets of quizzes under three levels of difficulty.

--------------------------------------------------------------
Detailed Description: 

1. What is the app all about?
The app aims at teaching spoken Kannada to non-Kannadigas within just 10 days. The app is smart enough to teach them the pronunciation of each and every word and also test if they are pronouncing it the right way.

2. What does the app contain?
    Instant Words Translation - A feature through which a user can speak a word in English and the app speaks back the translation in Kannada. The feature also has a mode to switch to "Kannada to English" where the user can speak a word in Kannada and the app speaks back the English word for the same.

    10 days course where a user can learn basic spoken Kannada with an example sentence for each word, everything with audio!

    Flexi Course which gets divided into "Alphabet", ‚ÄúWords‚Äù, ‚ÄúConversation‚Äù, ‚ÄúRandom Magic‚Äù and "Antonyms".

    a. Alphabet - Learn Kannada Alphabet pronunciation and also learn on how to write it. The user will have a dedicated screen to practice writing.
    b. Words - Learn words in Kannada Categories wise Example: Basics, Numbers, Alphabets, Vegetables, Fruits etc.
    c. Conversations - Learn basic conversations required. Example: Conversation with a maid, Conversation with auto driver etc.
    d. Random Magic - Learn Verbs and their tenses with audio messages.
    e. Antonyms - Words and its antonyms all with script and voice!*

    Quizzes- 300 MCQ questions to test yourself.

    Entertainment - Learn with fun, watch handpicked entertainment content on the app itself.

3. When was the app launched?
The beta version app was first launched on Nov 30, 2017, and so far the app has grown a lot on both technology and the user base.

4. What are the important statistics about the app?
As on 9th July 2019, the app has currently got more than 1,50,000+ downloads without marketing or promotion. The app has been spread only based on mouth marketing by users. The app also has 2500+ ratings with an average of 4.6+. The app is being used in more than 58+ countries worldwide!

5. Who built it and why?
The app has been built by HithAM Creations a team of just us two developers Varun and Rohith. We developed this app with help of one more friend Pooja HN for voice, all are working in Bengaluru, Karnataka. We always wanted to help interested non-Kannadigas learn Kannada and we were searching for a way to help a larger audience. That's when we started developing this app. We are still working on adding new features to the app which should make the learning more easier.

What else do we have other than the android app?
Facebook page: https://www.facebook.com/learnkannada.kannadakali/ 
Twitter: https://twitter.com/LearnKanSmartap
Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCizTKN-4GkCI1SrdiNFcweg 
Whatsapp Forum: https://chat.whatsapp.com/316diPAnLeU5ChRKajACyp 
Website: https://hithamcreations.wixsite.com/kannada-kali/ 

We have introduced "Learn Kannada through Tamil" in our app v3.7.0 and we would like to thank below our app users for their wonderful support in translations and verifications.
1. Kamal
2. Saravanan
3. Siddart
4. Praveen

For any feedback or reporting, you can send an email to us at hithamcreations@gmail.com

Detailed Description:

1. What is the app all about?
The app aims at teaching spoken Kannada to non-Kannadigas within just 10 days. The app is smart enough to teach them the pronunciation of each and every word and also test if they are pronouncing it the right way.

2. What does the app contain?
Instant Words Translation - A feature through which a user can speak a word in English and the app speaks back the translation in Kannada. The feature also has a mode to switch to "Kannada to English" where the user can speak a word in Kannada and the app speaks back the English word for the same.

10 days course where a user can learn basic spoken Kannada with an example sentence for each word, everything with audio!

Flexi Course which gets divided into "Alphabet", ‚ÄúWords‚Äù, ‚ÄúConversation‚Äù, ‚ÄúRandom Magic‚Äù and "Antonyms".

a. Alphabet - Learn Kannada Alphabet pronunciation and also learn on how to write it. The user will have a dedicated screen to practice writing.
b. Words - Learn words in Kannada Categories wise Example: Basics, Numbers, Alphabets, Vegetables, Fruits etc.
c. Conversations - Learn basic conversations required. Example: Conversation with a maid, Conversation with auto driver etc.
d. Random Magic - Learn Verbs and their tenses with audio messages.
e. Antonyms - Words and its antonyms all with script and voice!*

Quizzes- 300 MCQ questions to test yourself.

Entertainment - Learn with fun, watch handpicked entertainment content on the app itself.

3. When was the app launched?
The beta version app was first launched on Nov 30, 2017, and so far the app has grown a lot on both technology and the user base.

4. What are the important statistics about the app?
As on 9th July 2019, the app has currently got more than 1,50,000+ downloads without marketing or promotion. The app has been spread only based on mouth marketing by users. The app also has 2500+ ratings with an average of 4.6+. The app is being used in more than 58+ countries worldwide!

5. Who built it and why?
The app has been built by HithAM Creations a team of just us two developers Varun and Rohith. We developed this app with help of one more friend Pooja HN for voice, all are working in Bengaluru, Karnataka. We always wanted to help interested non-Kannadigas learn Kannada and we were searching for a way to help a larger audience. That's when we started developing this app. We are still working on adding new features to the app which should make the learning more easier.

What else do we have other than the android app?
Facebook page: https://www.facebook.com/learnkannada.kannadakali/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/LearnKanSmartap
Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCizTKN-4GkCI1SrdiNFcweg
Whatsapp Forum: https://chat.whatsapp.com/316diPAnLeU5ChRKajACyp
Website: https://hithamcreations.wixsite.com/kannada-kali/

We have introduced "Learn Kannada through Tamil" in our app v3.7.0 and we would like to thank below our app users for their wonderful support in translations and verifications.
1. Kamal
2. Saravanan
3. Siddart
4. Praveen

For any feedback or reporting, you can send an email to us at hithamcreations@gmail.com

title: Educational Games. Word Search
description:
Do you like Word Search? Kids will love this game!
Word Search for children is designed for children from 5 years old, helping them to learn to read and write words, or improve their reading and writing level.

This game is a classic mental challenge for children. Find the hidden words! 3 levels of difficulty, from very simple to challenging. Edujoy's word search is perfect for hours of entertainment and for training your mind.

DIFFERENT LEVELS OF DIFFICULTY

This game has different levels of difficulty, which makes it perfect for any child to find words on the same subject within a complete chart of letters.

Simple level: The grid is 5 X 5 so it is easy to find the words and solve the puzzle. In addition, the track system helps the little ones continue with the game even if they get stuck.

Middle Level: The grid in this case is 7X7. Ideal for slightly older children as the difficulty begins to increase.

Difficult level: The grid is 9X9 and the games begin to get complicated. This is a level aimed at children who have already played word search previously.

GAME FEATURES

*This game is completely free
* The game offers hints so children can use them when blocked with words.
* Words in 6 languages. This game is available in English, Spanish, Italian, French, Portuguese and Russian.
* 15 word categories: Choose between different themes of drawings and words: food, animals, professions, sports, numbers, and more.
* Hundreds of words to play for hours.
* 3 levels of difficulty for children of different ages.
* Pronunciation of each letter and word so that children learn to read easily.
* Helps to develop fine motor skills and coordination by moving the letters on the board.

You will never play the same word search! Infinite possibilities! Our system of creating random games makes it always a challenge for you and your mind. Thus, your kids will never be bored and they will always have a challenge.

A lot of themes: food, animals, transport, home, colors, sports, etc. Are you ready to solve hundreds of fun letter puzzles?

This game tests the ingenuity of children and helps them learn new vocabulary and associate images with words. On one hand, children will learn to differentiate letters from the alphabet and on the other, be able to form words and relate them to objects.

In addition to stimulating intelligence and attention, children review the letters of the alphabet and their writing, while learning new words in different languages.

PRONOUNCE WORDS

This game offers the possibility to hear the sound of each word proposed. In this way, children will learn to read and spell all words in 6 different languages and to identify their sound. 

This app can be used by kids with dislexia or other learning difficulties, helping them to improve their reading skills. 

EDUJOY EDUCATIONAL GAMES 

This app is part of an educational games collection created by Edujoy in order to help kids develop new intellectual and motor skills from elements of their environment.

All of our games are created by professional educators and psychologists in order to provide pedagogical content, necessary for the intellectual development of babies and children.

We love creating educational and fun games for you. If you have any suggestions or questions, feel free to send us feedback or leave a comment.

title: English Vocabulary Builder for GRE¬Æ, SAT¬Æ & more
description:
‚è© The Galvanize English Vocabulary Builder app continues to help countless students improve vocabulary EFFORTLESSLY. Want to be next?  ‚è™

The English Vocabulary Builder app from Galvanize Test Prep is a unique learning tool: why study a long and boring list of English words when you can experience a gamified vocabulary journey - one that is bound to be thoughtful, exciting and fun!

WARNING: Some students actually found this Vocabulary app to be addictive. Try it and let us know how you feel :-)

5 reasons why everyone is so damn crazy about our vocab app:
‚òÖ Fun and easy way to learn: 
‚ÄúEarn‚Äù game currency whenever you master words. The more game-money you make, the better. This is a fun way to learn new Vocab words and build your GRE vocabulary.
‚òÖ Confidence booster: 
Gain confidence as the words on the vocab app increase in difficulty. Have fun with flashcards by implementing these English words into your day-to-day vocabulary!
‚òÖ Addictive: 
With a pictorial representation accompanying words, examples of the words as used in sentences and many other features you‚Äôll soon be addicted to this vocab builder app.
‚òÖ Prep for all Tests: 
This vocabulary app is the perfect aid to prepare for any competitive exam that include verbal sections like the GRE¬Æ, SAT¬Æ, GMAT¬Æ, CAT¬Æ, UPSC¬Æ, SSC¬Æ, IBPS¬Æ, Bank PO, Bank Clerk, MAT¬Æ, MBA, IAS¬Æ, NDA, AFCAT¬Æ, TOEFL¬Æ, IELTS¬Æ, ESL and all other campus recruitment tests, placement exams, aptitude tests, standardized tests, and competitive exams.

‚òÖ Best experience ever: 
With a simple-to-use interface, you‚Äôll feel like never leaving this vocabulary app.

And another bunch of cool features you'll go head over heels for: 
‚òÖ Save time by studying only words you don't already know
‚òÖ 1800 must-know GRE words to improve English Vocabulary
‚òÖ Context-based word learning with real-life and fictitious examples
‚òÖ Understand the Nuances of wordlist - something very important for GRE¬Æ English vocabulary
‚òÖ Long term retention with pictures and flashcards.
‚òÖ Learn complex GRE¬Æ, SAT¬Æ, GMAT¬Æ, TOEFL¬Æ, IELTS¬Æ words with crystal clear definitions
‚òÖ Get examples of the common words used in sentences
‚òÖ Learn advanced synonyms and antonyms, etymology and perfect pronunciation
‚òÖ Bookmark difficult words and the most confusing GRE¬Æ words to refer to easily anytime
‚òÖ Get insights into your vocabulary skill-level
‚òÖ Get notified as to how quickly you‚Äôre learning with this wordbot app
‚òÖ Test your grasp over the vocabulary you learned newly
‚òÖ With the flashcards on this GRE vocab app, it is easy to build your GRE vocabulary
‚òÖ The best part is that this wordbot app WORKS OFFLINE!

About Galvanize Test Prep:
At Galvanize Test Prep, we focus on delivering the world‚Äôs best learning solutions for Standardized tests like GRE¬Æ, TOEFL¬Æ, and Competitive exams, as well as Global Admissions Counselling. Thousands of students from 190+ countries, each with their own unique story.

Any questions?
Please email us at galvanize@entrayn.com if you have any questions or concerns.

Note:
1) For Android versions 4.1 - 4.4, the app download size is around 25 MB.
2) To motivate users to learn English vocabulary words, the app awards points in the form of dollars ($). However, this is just play money, i.e., there is no real monetary value for any "money" earned in this vocab game!
